Detailed Description

Store, process read RCstaff::RCoption() "RC", read RCstaff::FDoption() "FD", extract contrasts.

This class is used for loading, storing, saving, processing the rocking curve of the analyzer from the point of view of the EDEI method.

Also member functions of this class perform EDEI processing of the contrasts basing on the preloaded read RCstaff::RCoption() "RC", read RCstaff::FDoption() "FD".

Basically the usage of this class assumes following steps:

  • Setting parameters (all non-const public variables). It can be done either by hand or via the command line options using POPT_TABLERC() option table parsed by the libpopt.
  • Loading read RCstaff::RCoption() "RC" (loadRC()) or read RCstaff::FDoption() "FD" (loadFD()).
  • If you need to convert read RCstaff::FDoption() "FD" to read RCstaff::RCoption() "RC" just call to saveFD() (see rc2fd.cpp for example).
  • Extract contrast(s) via refract() and/or absorb().

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum EDEIprocess::Component

Two contrast components available in the EDEI experiment.

Enumerator:
ABS 

Apparent absorption (abs+small-angle scat.).

REF 

Clean refraction.
